data.name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Schwarzmüller Trailer Pack
data.detailed_description:
We are proud to introduce five highly detailed trailer models officially licensed from The Schwarzmüller Group to Euro Truck Simulator 2.

The Schwarzmüller Group develops, builds and services commercial vehicles that are ideal for highly competitive and demanding businesses.

The content of this DLC includes:

  • Curtain Sider
  • Refrigerated Trailer
  • Slidepost Logging Trailer
  • Food Cistern
  • Low Bed Trailer

data.short_description: We are proud to introduce five highly detailed trailer models officially licensed from The Schwarzmüller Group to Euro Truck Simulator 2. The Schwarzmüller Group develops, builds and services commercial vehicles that are ideal for highly competitive and demanding businesses.
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
